positive_examples: This is an example of metallic conductor.
The metallic conductor demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed metallic conductor in this context.
A typical case of metallic conductor would involve these features.
The concept of metallic conductor applies here.
A substance that conducts electricity through the movement of free electrons in a metallic structure.
negative_examples: This is an example of electrolyte, not metallic conductor.
This represents conductor substance in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Electrolyte, or other types of ConductorSubstance

definition: A material that conducts electricity through the movement of free electrons in metals.
